message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $9,500.  It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of your product, but I am only willing to pay $9,000. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm not quite there yet.  $9,250 is the lowest I can go. This still gives you a great deal on a valuable product. Let's see if we can make this work.
Hello Alice, I've considered your latest offer and I'm willing to pay $9,100 for the product. I believe this is a fair compromise considering its value.
